item.title: Regulating Online Defamatory and Insulting Speech under Thai Law
item.description: The Suitability of the Thai laws of Defamation and Insult to Regulate Speech Online The Internet allows us to freely express ideas more than other types of communication. Some online speech may impact a personality right. Law should strike a fair balance between preserving the freedom of speech and providing the protection to a personality right. Thai law protects personality rights by the laws which were enacted before the Internet period; thus, it is unclear whether these laws are suitable for regulating online speech.
